simplified: 海内存知己，天涯若比邻

pronunciation.pinyin: hǎi nèi cún zhī jǐ , tiān yá ruò bǐ lín
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: hai3 nei4 cun2 zhi1 ji3 , tian1 ya2 ruo4 bi3 lin2

details.simplified: 海内存知己，天涯若比邻
details.traditional: 海內存知己，天涯若比鄰

meanings.value: close friend in a distant land, far-flung realms as next door
close in spirit although far away
